request.description:
AC1:
Given a request to view all professional users for a given organisation
When the request is received
And NO Request parameter is included (i.e. the Endpoint does not contain, showdeleted={True/False})
      Then list of professional users, excluding the 'Deleted' ones', is returned
      AND HTTP status is returned 200
 
AC2:
Given a request to view all professional users for a given organisation
When the request is received
And there is NO Organisation for the given Organisation ID
      Then HTTP status is returned 404
 
AC3: (to be tested as part of RDCC - 207 - here for reference only so that the story makes sense)
Given a request to view all professional users for a given organisation
When the request is received
And the Request parameter is set to 'True'
      Then list of all the professional users, including the 'Deleted' ones', is returned
      AND HTTP status is returned 200
 
AC4:
Given a request to view all professional users for a given organisation
When the request is received
And the Organisation 'status' is NOT 'active'     
Then NO users will be returned (only an empty list of Users will be shown)
      AND HTTP status is returned 200
